officialTitle: The Effects of Glucose Control and Monitor on Inflammation in the Hospitalized Patients With Hyperglycemia
inclusionCriteria:
* Type 2 diabetic inpatient
* Fasting glucose \>140 mg/dl or random glucose \>180 mg/dl
* Must have minimum age of 20 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* incooperative for glucose monitor
* refusal of insulin
* pregnancy
